name: Login page on mobile emulation device

nodes.name: Check layout: specs/loginPage.gspec included tags: mobile

sections.name: Skeleton
&skeleton_elements sides are vertically inside screen
&skeleton_elements are aligned vertically above each other
A page should be centered horizontally inside screen with 900px on desktop, but on mobile and tablet it should stretch to screen
every &skeleton_element is centered horizontally inside screen
every &skeleton_element is aligned vertically all screen
Header
Menu
amount of visible &menu_items should be > 3
every &menu_item is inside menu and has height ~ 64px
first &menu_item is inside menu 0px top left
&menu_items are rendered in 2 column table layout
Footer
Login box

specGroups.name: located at the top inside content with 20 to 45px margin

sections.name: &login_box_elements should be more or less readable
every &login_box_textfield has height 34px
&login_box_buttons should be tapable
Styling
login_button should look like a primary button
cancel_button should look like a secondary button
&login_box_elements are aligned vertically above each other with 5 to 20px margin
&login_box_elements sides are vertically inside login_box with 0px margin

nodes.name: Type "qweqwe" to username on Login page
Check layout: specs/loginPage-withErrorMessage.gspec included tags: mobile

sections.name: Error message
password_textfield, error_message are aligned vertically above each other with 5 to 30px margin
error_message, login_button are aligned vertically above each other with 5 to 30px margin
